Method Detail

findWeatherStationsNearTo

public static java.util.LinkedList<WeatherLocationIDAndName> findWeatherStationsNearTo(java.lang.String location)
Find weather stations near a given location

Parameters:
location - The location to find weather stations near
Returns:
A list of locations (returns null if location was invalid)

getWeatherForecast

public static java.util.LinkedList<ForecastForOneDay> getWeatherForecast(WeatherLocationIDAndName station)
Get the three-day weather forecast for a given weather station

Parameters:
station - The station to return the weather forecast for
Returns:
A list of forecasts, where the first entry on the list is today; the next is tomorrow; etc.

getAcknowledgement

public static java.lang.String getAcknowledgement()
Get the acknowledgement that should be displayed on any application using this weather forecast. It is a requirement of using this class that the source of the data is acknowledged, by e.g. displaying the string returned by this method in the GUI.

Returns:
Returns "Supported by backstage.bbc.co.uk / Data from UK MET Office"
